CVE.summary: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE 6 Update 25 and earlier, 5.0 Update 29 and earlier, and 1.4.2_31 and earlier allow remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

Oval.title: HP-UX Running Java, Remote Unauthorized Access, Disclosure of Information, and Other Vulnerabilities

Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE 6 Update 25 and earlier, 5.0 Update 29 and earlier, and 1.4.2_31 and earlier allow remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.
